author: FOX Sports North
title: Vikings draft profile: LSU CB Kristian Fulton
description: With needs in the secondary, would LSU cornerback Kristian Fulton be a good fit for the Minnesota Vikings?
content:
If the cap-strapped Minnesota Vikings are going to contend for an NFC North division title and make a deep playoff run in 2020, theyll need to draft very, very well.
